abstract: The layout direction of the user interface.
overview:
## Discussion

This property specifies the general user interface layout flow directions. For subclasses that have multiple visual components in a single cell instance, this property should specify the directionality or flow of components.

# userInterfaceLayoutDirection

**Instance Property**

The layout direction of the user interface.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var userInterfaceLayoutDirection: NSUserInterfaceLayoutDirection { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property specifies the general user interface layout flow directions. For subclasses that have multiple visual components in a single cell instance, this property should specify the directionality or flow of components.
title: userInterfaceLayoutDirection
